Pushbutton handling
online task
-- Message "Updates will be performed in the background" via BID470
// Link to Debtor Heller with DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH from DEBH of the debtor
// to fetch DEBH_TOTACREDITLIMSUPPLIED
call init task
call online task
1. Update DEBTOR_CLIENT
2. Save legal collection details
-- if GSBU_AMOUNT > 0 and DLCH_AMOUNTINCASSO > GSBU_AMOUNT (GSBU_ID = 2069 / GSBU_OFFICE = HUSR_HOFF_CODE) then
-- call batch job BMQ005
3. Update TEMP_INVOICE_DISPUTE
4. Submit BID470 for remaining updates
-- Message "Updates will be performed in the background" is displayed in part task, outside current
end VALIDATION
cancel answer = 'N'
cancel annswer <>'N'
end CANCEL
//SLECT ALL INVOICES

//fetch initial value from DEBB SCR #2431
-- Special test for country = 'PL', see SCR6796, 17.08.2004 SH
02.12.2005 MW SCR#9661 --> Initial values
-- Special test if button OK was pressed, only relevant for GNRL_CODE = PL
-- No invoice is selected
-- In case of additional legal collection updates necessary, some values have to
be entered by the users
-- Normally it's not allowed to leave the screen with button "Cancel" or
key "Esc" because the additional legal collection updates are mandatory
and therefore the fields on screen have to be entered
If the users leaves the screen with Cancel / Esc then all updates of
ODC003C4A and ODC003C4B will be skipped
-- first three fields on screen are mandatory, else all DB updates of ODC003C4
are not possible
-- Validate with GB005 If PO.ERRORCODE > 0 then errormessage = "Start date outside allowed range ..."
-- Validate with GB005 If PO.ERRORCODE > 0 then errormessage = "Agenda date outside allowed range ..."
-- In case of no error "ODC003C4B Additional updates legal collection" is called
task "Open transaction"
-- Normally it's not allowed to leave the screen with button "Cancel" or
key "Esc" because the additional legal collection updates are mandatory
and therefore the fields on screen have to be entered
If the users leaves the screen with Cancel / Esc then all updates of
ODC003C4A and ODC003C4B will be skipped
if client have insurance
client do not have insurance

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/JOBL where JOBL_PROGRAMCODE = 'BID470' and JOBL_DATESUBMITTED = ':2' and JOBL_PARAMETERS like '%:3%' for fetch only
